name: Eorzea Time
author: Rewind Creation

sections.description: Eorzea Time allows you to display in-game time for a popular MMO on your WordPress site.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the eorzea-time.zip.
  2. Upload the eorzea-time folder to your /wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. Activate Eorzea Time in Plugin section
sections.faq:
Why was this plugin created?

This plugin is created for my fellow Eorzean.

How To Use It

  1. Unzip the file and upload to wp-content/plugins folder
  2. Active the Plugin

To display the clock:
1. Use the Eorzea Time widget
1. or include anythere in HTML

To display unspoiled node, use class ffxiv_nodes and specify the time in data-time attribute.

Example:

This note will spwan at 1PM

short_description: Eorzea Time allows you to display in-game time for a popular online game on your WordPress site.
description: Eorzea Time allows you to display in-game time for a popular MMO on your WordPress site.
